/* 
 * File:   main.cpp
 * Author: root
 *
 * Created on February 8, 2016, 9:28 AM
 */

#include <iostream>



/*
 * 
 */


int main(int argc, char** argv) {

using namespace std;

int T,i,ret,temp1,temp2,min=0,index=0;

int arr[10]={0};

//cout << "Enter No of test cases" << endl;

cin >> T;

while(T--)
{
   min=0,index=0;
   
    for(i=0;i<10;++i)
    {
        cin >> arr[i];
    
        if(i==0)
        {
            min = arr[i];
        }
        else
        {
            if(arr[i] < min)
                min = arr[i];
        }           
    }
    
    for(i=0;i<10;++i)
    {
        if(arr[i] == min)
        {
            index = i;
            
            if(index)
                break;
        }
    }
    
    if(index)
    {
        for(i=0;i<=min;++i)
            cout<<index;
    }
    else
    {
        cout<<"1";
        
        for(i=0;i<=min;++i)
            cout<<"0";
        
    }            

    cout<<"\n";



}


    






    

    return 0;
}
